name: Elepet Collector
description:
You are assigned to manage a group of elemental pets.  They aren't dangerous on their own, but when combined with each other, they can get out of hand easily.  Try to use the tools provided to keep their elemental objects at bay.

  • Chop down the trees with the axe
  • Scoop up with water with the bucket
  • Break apart the rocks with the pick
  • Extinguish the fire with the extinguisher

You move with WASD or arrows.  Pick up and drop items with Q.  Click to use the items on the object you wish to destroy.

Fire spreads to trees.  Trees soak up water and grow bigger.  Rocks just get in the way, but appear more often.

Once you've let 50 objects appear the game is over.

Made for Weekly Game Jam 125.  Theme: Dangerous Collection
